Title: Chapter Four
Writer: Olan Rogers (developed for television by), David Sacks (developed for television by), Olan Rogers (created by), Olan Rogers, David Sacks, Jane Becker (executive story editor), Alyssa Lane (story editor), Alex J. Sherman (story editor)
Actors: Fred Armisen, Tom Kenny, Olan Rogers, Tika Sumpter
Plot: After Gary is reunited with Quinn, the Galaxy One is hacked by the Infinity Guard, prompting Gary to harvest solar power from a nearby star to repower it. The radiation from the star triggers painful memories from Gary's past.
